attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2003-1865

Date: 2003-11-19

                     Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Transport, pursuant to section 105 of the Financial Administration Act, hereby approves the appointment by the Minister of Transport of the following persons as directors of the board of directors of Parc Downsview Park Inc., to hold office during pleasure, for a term of three years:


                     Douglas Birkenshaw

                     Toronto, Ontario


                     Toni Varone

                     Toronto, Ontario


                     John S. Bailey

                     Toronto, Ontario



                     Sur recommandation du ministre des Transports et en vertu de l’article 105 de la Loi sur la gestion des finances publiques, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil approuve la nomination par le ministre des Transports des personnes suivantes, administrateurs du conseil d’administration de Parc Downsview Park Inc., à titre amovible, pour un mandat de trois ans :


                     Douglas Birkenshaw

                     Toronto (Ontario)


                     Toni Varone

                     Toronto (Ontario)


                     John S. Bailey

                     Toronto (Ontario)
